resources.string: Your receipt will now be checked and you will receive a notice soon.
The sticker is not available. Do you want to redeem the coupon anyway?
Bring the Sticker into the display

"1. Look for the sticker at the cash desk 
2. Put you mobile on the sticker 
 (NFC has to be enabled) 
3. Show your mobile to the employee"
"1. Look for the sticker at the cash desk \n2. Scan the QR-Code to redeem \n3. Show your mobile to the employee"
Want to redeem this coupon multiple times?
Is the full receipt in the photo?
Unfortunately, the memory of your smartphone is full. You should clean your memory by closing all applications and then start COUPIES again.
A problem occurred. Please try again.
Der interne Speicher deines Smartphones ist zu voll, bitte versuch es erneut.
Es ist ein Fehler beim konvertieren des Fotos aufgetreten, bitte versuch es erneut.
Die Kamera deines Smartphones konnte nicht gestartet werden, bitte versuch es erneut.
Branch address, total and Date of purchase must be visible.
If the receipt is too long, you can add up to two additional sections.
Bring your receipt in the frame. If the receipt is too long, take a picture of upper part.
